room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
room_address: 8255 Sunset Boulevard West Hollywood Los Angeles CA 90046
room_description: You are sentenced to life in a maximum security prison. With all appeal requests denied, your only path to freedom is to escape. A sudden riot provides the perfect opportunity. You know that the guard will take control of the riot in 60 minutes. Can you use the elements in your prison cell to break free or will you and your cell mates spend the rest of your days behind bars?
